review: Great Value, exactly what I was hoping it would do. Amazon Prime is a great combination with it.
author: Molly

review: Works very well for the price!! Easy to install! Not slow like other reviews said. Love it!!
author: Jason Austin

review: Even with amazon prime alot of movies and TV shows have to be purchased other than that it's a great product and let's you access all of your streaming in one device.
author: ZACHARY LEE COWAN

review: You need to buy this - just dropped our cable bill by over $100 per month - $1200 savings I will take it
author: Jeff Peck

review: Works great!!! Exactly what I needed!!!
author: Brandon Razo
